availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Kuntz (Louisville, Kentucky, tavern keeper and hotel proprietor)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, tavern keeper and hotel proprietor. Native of Baden. Married to Magdalena "Lena" Miller Kuntz in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on March 2, 1854. Father of Nicholas Kuntz, John Kuntz, Harriett Kuntz, Maggie Kuntz, and Emma Kuntz. Tavern keeper in Louisville in 1858. Tavern keeper in Louisville in 1860. Proprietor of the William Tell Hotel in Louisville in 1861.

ab.bibl:
